content: the backwards loop cast on 13 stitches round 2 k around repeat round two 28 times or until knitting reaches the top of your finger next round k2tog 6 times k1 break yarn draw through remaining stitches and pull tight index finger place the 10 remaining stitches on two double pointed needles round 1 pick up 3 stitches from the cast-on stitches at the base of the middle finger k10 13 stitches round 2 k around repeat round two 25 times or until knitting reaches the top of your finger next round k2tog 6 times k1 break yarn draw through remaining stitches and pull tight thumb place 7 knuckle side stitches on a double pointed needle a and the 7 palm side stitches on another double pointed needle b round 1 starting at the right hand end of needle a k14 pick up two stitches 16 stitches rounds 2-5 k around round 6 k12 k2tog ssk 14 stitches round 7 k around repeat round seven 13 times or until knitting reaches the top of your thumb next round k2tog 7 times break yarn draw through remaining stitches and pull tight weave in all ends securely wash gloves gently reshape and dry flat on a towel please report any errata to me at thomasinaknits@yahoo co uk pattern and images © liz thompson 2008 pattern for personal use only
